name: Imagmanation
description:
Imagmanation sees you as a young boy who's imagination has warped his reality. His home has suddenly filled with lava and has expanded beyond reason! In this new twisted reality, you must help the boy navigate 7 unique levels to reach the end and put a stop to this madness! 

Features:

-7 unique levels

-Collectibles

-Level unlock system

-Original Artwork

-Short gameplay, should take less than 10 minutes
